amendment.description: Amendment sought to create an exception for any rule making to carry out the FDA Food Safety Modernization Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 112-296 to create an exception for any rule making to carry out the FDA Food Safety Modernization Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 250 (Roll no. 878).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 250 (Roll no. 878).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
